songs.title: OUTRO. 신곡 (DIVINA COMMEDIA)
songs.lyrics:
Hangul
[Verse 1]
개천에 용이 난데
가족 아니면 생판 남 몰라
고생 끝에 낙이
(Divina Commedia)

[Verse 2]
별 볼 일 없는 지하에서 별이 돼
자체 발광이 직업병이래
Nurse, heal me, I'll pay you more
I'll be your billionaire (prince)
내 나이 갓 만 30세 이상해?
정상 맞지?
남들 성장할 때 상장해
키는 좀 작지

[Pre-Chorus]
엄마 아무 걱정하지 말아요
난 문제가 아냐 문제의 답이에요
촉이 와, 초기화. '영감' 도 세워

[Chorus]
Right? Wrong?
다들 무슨 죄, 죄다 모순데
Right? Wrong?
이해가? 안가. 말이 돼? 안돼
엄마 아무 걱정하지 말아요
난 문제가 아냐 문제의 답이에요
촉이 와, 초기화. '영감' 도 세워
(Divina Commedia)

[Post-Chorus]
Gone. I'm Numb. I'm Numb. Yea, I am
Gone. I'm Numb. I'm Numb. Yea, I am
Gone. I'm Numb. I'm Numb. Yea, I am
Gone. I'm Numb. I'm Numb. Yea, I am

[Verse 3]
왜 인생을 코미디라 하지?
웃다가 울다가 하니?
난 지금 무슨 표정?
어떤 얼굴의 모습? 가식이 탈이지
죽어라 자기최면을 거네
잘 먹고 살려고 명을 거래해
이름값이 얼마 하게
(You'll pay?)
궁금하면 연락해
(To. 태희)

[Verse 4]
Success? 막 발악하고 빌고
애써 노력하면 뭐해
누가 알아준대?
I've been there, Suck-ass
모든건 한방에 와
삶에 파도 치면 타고
Swervin' Surfin' Dive in
Don't get Swept Away

[Chorus]
Right? Wrong?
다들 무슨 죄, 죄다 모순데
Right? Wrong?
이해가? 안가. 말이 돼? 안돼
엄마 아무 걱정하지 말아요
난 문제가 아냐 문제의 답이에요
촉이 와, 초기화. '영감' 도 세워
(Divina Commedia)

[Bridge]
우리는 각자의 세상에 살고 있어
(무대에)
기획 제작 각본 연출 주인공 돼
(꿈에)
'비현실이 초현실'
"In case I don't see ya
Good-afternoon
Good-evenin' and 굿밤..."

[Chorus]
Right? Wrong?
다들 무슨 죄, 죄다 모순데
Right? Wrong?
시민가수가 국민배우가 돼
엄마 아무 걱정하지 말아요
난 문제가 아냐 문제의 답이에요
촉이 와, 초기화. '영감' 도 세워
(Divina Commedia)

[Post-Chorus]
Gone. I'm Numb. I'm Numb. Yea, I am
Gone. I'm Numb. I'm Numb. Yea, I am
Gone. I'm Numb. I'm Numb. Yea, I am
Gone. I'm Numb. I'm Numb. Yea, I am
(Divina Commedia)
Romanization
[Verse 1]
Gaecheone yongi nande
Gajok animyeon saengpan nam molla
Gosaeng kkeute nagi
(Divina Commedia)

[Verse 2]
Byeol bol il eopneun jihaeseo byeori dwae
Jache balgwangi jigeopbyeongirae
Nurse, heal me, I'll pay you more
I’ll be your billionaire (prince)
Nae nai gat man 30se isanghae?
Jeongsang majji?
Namdeul seongjanghal ttae sangjanghae
Kineun jom jakji

[Pre-Chorus]
Eomma amu geokjeonghaji marayo
Nan munjega anya munjeui dabieyo
Chogi wa, chogihwa. ‘yeonggam’ do sewo

[Chorus]
Right? Wrong?
Dadeul museun joe, joeda mosunde
Right? Wrong?
Ihaega? anga. mari dwae? andwae
Eomma amu geokjeonghaji marayo
Nan munjega anya munjeui dabieyo
Chogi wa, chogihwa. ‘yeonggam’ do sewo
(Divina Commedia)

[Post-Chorus]
Gone. I’m Numb. I’m Numb. Yea, I am
Gone. I’m Numb. I’m Numb. Yea, I am
Gone. I’m Numb. I’m Numb. Yea, I am
Gone. I’m Numb. I’m Numb. Yea, I am

[Verse 3]
Wae insaengeul komidira haji?
Usdaga uldaga hani?
Nan jigeum museun pyojeong?
Eotteon eolgurui moseup? gasigi tariji
Jugeora jagichoemyeoneul geone
Jal meokgo sallyeogo myeongeul georaehae
Ireumgapsi eolma hage
(You’ll pay?)
Gunggeumhamyeon yeonrakhae
(To. Taehee)

[Verse 4]
Success? mak barakhago bilgo
Aesseo noryeokhamyeon mwohae
Nuga arajundae?
I’ve been there, Suck-at
Modeungeon hanbange wa
Salme pado chimyeon tago
Swervin, surfin, dive-in'
Don't get swept away

[Chorus]
Right? Wrong?
Dadeul museun joe, joeda mosunde
Right? Wrong?
Ihaega? anga. mari dwae? andwae
Eomma amu geokjeonghaji marayo
Nan munjega anya munjeui dabieyo
Chogi wa, chogihwa. ‘yeonggam’ do sewo
(Divina Commedia)

[Bridge]
Urineun gakjaui sesange salgo isseo
(mudaee)
Gihoek jejak gakbon yeonchul juingong dwae
(kkume)
‘bihyeonsiri chohyeonsil’
“In case I don’t see ya
Good-afternoon
Good-evenin’ and gusbam…”

[Chorus]
Right? Wrong?
Dadeul museun joe, joeda mosunde
Right? Wrong?
Simingasuga gukminbaeuga dwae
Eomma amu geokjeonghaji marayo
Nan munjega anya munjeui dabieyo
Chogi wa, chogihwa. ‘yeonggam’ do sewo
(Divina Commedia)

[Post-Chorus]
Gone. I’m Numb. I’m Numb. Yea, I am
Gone. I’m Numb. I’m Numb. Yea, I am
Gone. I’m Numb. I’m Numb. Yea, I am
Gone. I’m Numb. I’m Numb. Yea, I am
(Divina Commedia)
English Translation
[Verse 1]
They say that dragons rise from humble beginnings
If it's not family, it's a stranger - I can't tell
The joy that follows hard work
(Divina Commedia)

[Verse 2]
A star is born from the uneventful underground
They say self radiance is an occupational disease (there's no cure)
Nurse, heal me, I'll pay you more
I’ll be your billionaire (prince)
I'm barely 30 years old, am I weird? (ay)
I'm normal, right?
While others grew, I listed stocks
That's why I'm a little short

[Pre-Chorus]
Mom, don’t worry about a thing
I’m not the problem, I’m the solution to the problem
I can feel the power (yeah), I can reset the inspiration

[Chorus]
Right? (wait) Wrong? (really)
Why is everyone a sinner when we're all the same (nah nah nah)
Right? Wrong? (really)
Get it? No. Does it make sense? No. (crazy)
Mom, don’t worry about a thing (don't worry bout me)
I’m not the problem, I’m the solution to the problem (yes, I'm me)
I can feel the power (ay, ay, period), I can reset the inspiration
(Divina Commedia)

[Post-Chorus]
Gone. I’m Numb. I’m Numb. Yea, I am
Gone. I’m Numb. I’m Numb. Yea, I am
Gone. I’m Numb. I’m Numb. Yea, I am
Gone. I’m Numb. I’m Numb. Yea, I am

[Verse 3]
Why do they say life is a comedy?
Because we laugh and cry?
What kind of face am I making right now?
It doesn't matter what kind, it's all a mask
Putting our lives on the line to self-hypnotize ourselves
Gambling with our lives just to live comfortably
Guess how much my name is worth (You’ll pay?)
Call if you’re curious (To. Taehee)

[Verse 4]
Success? Where does working hard
Begging and throwing tantrums get you?
When no one will acknowledge it anyways
I’ve been there, suck-ass
Everything comes at once
If the waves of life come crashing in, ride it
Swervin, surfin, dive-in
Don’t get swept away

[Chorus]
Right? (please) Wrong? (heal me)
Why is everyone a sinner when we're all the same (tell me)
Right? Wrong? (holdup)
Get it? No. Does it make sense? No. (crazy)
Mom, don’t worry about a thing (don't worry bout me)
I’m not the problem, I’m the solution to the problem (yes, I'm me)
I can feel the power (ay, ay, period), I can reset the inspiration
(Divina Commedia)

[Bridge]
We all live in our own world
On stage, planning, production, screenplay, directing, main leads
In our dreams, unreality is reality, Truman Show
“In case I don’t see ya
Good-afternoon
Good-evenin’ and good-night”

[Chorus]
Right? (wait) Wrong? (really)
Why is everyone a sinner (oh, me?) when we're all the same (nah)
Right? (holdup) Wrong?
A normal citizen who sings becomes a national actor (crazy)
Mom, don’t worry about a thing (I'm good)
I’m not the problem, I’m the solution to the problem (I'm good)
I can feel the power (period), I can reset the inspiration
(Divina Commedia)

[Post-Chorus]
Gone. I’m Numb. I’m Numb. Yea, I am
Gone. I’m Numb. I’m Numb. Yea, I am
Gone. I’m Numb. I’m Numb. Yea, I am
Gone. I’m Numb. I’m Numb. Yea, I am
(Divina Commedia)
